text: Kanye West The'Taylor Swift Moment'Helped Trigger My Breakdown Kanye West Says'Taylor Swift Moment'Indirectly Triggered Breakdown Breaking News Kanye West says Taylor Swift was one of the factors that caused his nervous breakdown in 2016 - - namely, the aftermath of interrupting her at the VMAs and how it affected his radio play. Ye released his interview with Charlamagne tha God Tuesday - - and in the first few minutes he explains what led to him being hospitalized in late November 2016. He says ever since he and Kim posted video seemingly showing Taylor knew about his infamous ` ` Famous'' lyric ahead of time... his relationship with radio has never been the same.
